topic.title: PERITONEAL DRAIN INSERTED FOLLOWING ABDOMINAL X-RAY INDICATOR
topic.shortdesc: For the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care,Â PERITONEAL DRAIN INSERTED FOLLOWING ABDOMINAL X-RAY INDICATOR indicates whether a peritoneal drain was inserted following an Abdominal X-Ray, at any time during the neonatal CRITICAL CARE PERIOD.
